title: White House Rules
description: In First Extreme American Makeover, Sameera showed the United States it was ready for a Pakistani-born First Daughter. With her brains and bravado,White House. Fabulous! Right? Actually, itâ s no fairy tale. The Secret Service and the paparazzi follow Sameera everywhere. She misses her friendsâ and even her schoolâ back home. So Sameera decides to escape. Will she be able to pull it off, or will her plan backfire on the entire First Family? This smart and funny novel continues the adventures of a Pakistani- American teen in the spotlight.
author: Mitali Perkins
